text: The greatest asset Donna brings to Fox is that she's going to force the GOP side to be on their A-game.  It's been easy for Republicans on Fox to be lazy pundits with limited pushback.  Donna will pushback and that will force the conversation to improve.

text: Apple won’t let people merge their accounts.  So I am stuck with an iTunes account under one user ID tied to an email address that doesn’t actually even work anymore and everything else under my iCloud account.  That also complicates two factor authentication.

text: This reminds me that I have an old account from the iTunes Store, created before Mobile Me and iCloud.  I have everything now under my iCloud account, except iTunes.
author: EWErickson

text: According to Apple, her birthday cannot be changed.  We can, however, delete her account and Apple ID and create a whole new one if we want.  We don’t want to do that.

text:
I tried to change it and her account said I would have to call Apple Support to make that change. So I did.

Wonderful lady as absolutely helpful as possible.

But it was no use.

text:
A brief word on Apple ID’s if you will.  Cc: @gruber

text: Lastly, just check out the comments to this post I put on Instagram.  These are not all rabid Trump supporters.  And yet… https://www.instagram.com/p/BvJoxAsB7I6/  CNN needs to embrace a bit of humility and let its work product speak for itself.
author: EWErickson

text: It's sad to see and think CNN really does have the opportunity to shine in ways Fox and MSNBC can't and won't, but that it is too interested in being the Diet Coke of Fox/MSNBC while relying on its old reputation as the 24 hour news leader.
author: EWErickson

text: Also, it is really amazing to see how many reporters, fact checkers, etc. are on staff and working hard at CNN.  They have an amazing brand, but for a network purportedly HQ'd in Georgia, they have lost their ability to relate to people who live there.
author: EWErickson

text: It'd be easier for them to argue they are not absorbed by the conventional wisdom of the Acela corridor by not being there.
author: EWErickson

text: Lots of polling from major, respected polling outlets shows a growing distrust with national media and Washington.  CNN has a way to differentiate itself from Fox, MSNBC, ABC/CBS/NBC, etc. by being outside the beltway/DC corridor.
author: EWErickson

text: Their fighting with Fox has more to do with hurting Fox financially and helping themselves instead of supplanting Fox.  But I have to say I really wish CNN would reinvest in Atlanta.  It gives it a unique way to segment itself.
author: EWErickson

text: Second, I am fearful now that AT&T will wind down CNN's Atlanta operations and I really think that would be a mistake.  I have had several people tell me CNN has no interest in vying for #1.  They can be where they are and are highly profitable.
author: EWErickson

text: First, the CNN Tour is a tourist trap.  I was hoping for more.  My daughter, who is used to going with me to CNN, was very disappointed.
author: EWErickson

text: The Battle of Atlanta Cyclorama has been fully restored. It is about 50ft tall and 350ft long. Painted 25 yrs after the Civil War, it is breathtaking. See it at the Atlanta History Museum.
